data.price: et ceux qui disent : “Notre Seigneur! Écarte de nous le châtiment de l’Enfer !” Certes, son châtiment est permanent.
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا ٱصۡرِفۡ عَنَّا عَذَابَ جَهَنَّمَۖ إِنَّ عَذَابَهَا كَانَ غَرَامًا

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yaqūlūna rabbanā iṣ'rif ʿannā ʿadhāba jahannama inna ʿadhābahā kāna gharāman

data.price: Quel mauvais gîte et lieu de séjour !

dua.name: Dua for Guidance in Confusion
dua.significanceReason: Seeks divine guidance during periods of spiritual and personal confusion, asking for clarity and illumination of the path.

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
